amendment.description: An amendment numbered 95 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to increase funding for USAID's global health programs by $209 million in order to increase funding for bilateral tuberculosis (TB) assistance to $450 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A052) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A052) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A052) offered by Mr. Engel.
